main event: An unidentified metallic object was observed traversing at a slow rate of speed.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 1 hour., The object was reported to have a shiny, glass or silver metallic appearance., It was observed moving in a NE to N direction., The object was possibly identified as a balloon., There were no photographs taken during the sighting.
witness description: Assistant mobilization and test of B-distillers, male, age 32.
